modmenu.descriptionTranslation.moreculli: A mod that changes how multiple types of culling are handled in order to improve performance
moreculling.title: MoreCulling
moreculling.config.option.cloudCulling.t: Changing the opengl winding order to apply face culling
moreculling.config.option.signTextCullin: Culls sign text so that it wont render when you can't see it in some cases
moreculling.config.option.entityModelCul: This only helps if your gpu is the bottleneck and your cpu has some performance to spare!
moreculling.config.option.customItemFram: Enables the custom item frame renderer
moreculling.config.option.itemFrameMapCu: Enables Map culling in item frames
moreculling.config.option.itemFrameLODRa: Change the distance that this culling starts to work at
moreculling.config.option.itemFrame3Face: Change the distance that this culling starts to work at, may be visible at smaller distances
Change the type of culling used for leaves
moreculling.config.option.leavesCullingA: Change how much leaves should check for Depth-based culling. Lower is faster!
moreculling.config.option.mangroveOnly: Will only cull Mangrove Roots when using: %s
moreculling.config.option.includeMangrov: If mangrove roots should also be culled using the same way. BlockState does not work!
moreculling.config.option.powderSnowCull: Fixes powder snow not culling against solid faces
moreculling.config.option.useOnModdedBlo: If blockstate culling should work on modded blocks by default
moreculling.config.optionDisabled: This option is disabled when using: %s
